DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect 6 week Nicotinamide Riboside supplementation ( 1000 mg/day ) metabolic health healthy ( pre ) obese human . The primary objective hepatic whole body insulin sensitivity . Secondary objective , provide information underlie mechanism , muscle mitochondrial function , brown fat activity , ectopic lipid accumulation , energy metabolism , cardiovascular risk parameter , body composition acetylcarnitine level .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Caucasian Males postmenopausal female Aged 4565 year start study Body mass index ( BMI ) 27 35 kg/m2 Stable dietary habit ( weight loss gain > 5kg past 3 month ) Sedentary lifestyle ( 2 hour sport per week ) Type 2 diabetes Active disease ( cardiovascular , diabetes , liver , kidney , cancer ) Contraindication MRI Participation earlier research medical examination include PET/CT scan Alcohol consumption > 2 serving per day Smoking past 6 month
